Note.Name: Crater
Note.Text: We create a very large Craterfield where one large crater dominates the landscape.

Note.Name: Erosion
Note.Text:
Erosion with high Random Sedimentation and Sediment Removal gives our craterfield an eroded look without creating too many soil deposits.
This helps preserve the shape while adding erosive details.

Note.Name: Shear
Note.Text: Shear adds small structural collapses across all the crater walls.

Note.Name: Sea
Note.Parameters: Level = 3.65%, Shore Size = 100.00%, Shore Height = 20.47%, Variation = 100.00%, Extra Cliff Details = True
Note.Text: Finally we add coastal erosion with the Sea node that crates cliffs near the large crater wall, and large beaches near the water.
